snippet: An Egyptian court sentenced an activist to six months in prison on Monday on charges that he insulted President Mohamed Morsi and circulated false news on television.
abstract: Egyptian court sentences activist Ahmed Douma to six months in prison on charges that he insulted Egypt's Pres Mohamed Morsi and circulated false news on television.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian court sentenced an activist to six months in prison on Monday on charges that he insulted President Mohamed Morsi and circulated false news on television.

headline.main: Egypt: Activist Sentenced to Prison for Insulting Morsi
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Activist Sentenced to Prison for Insulting Morsi
